attributes.action: enforce by laws/acts childrens safe-keeping within schools from bullying.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently there is none or minimal guidlines/laws/acts published by the government to ensure that bullying is dealt with accoardingly and correctly stopped and consquences of schools/colleges not complying  can be punished in the court of law. Obviously bullying is an extremely serious problem as it can lead to low self-esteem, low confidence , self-harm and also leads to children taking there own life!
